company.name: Scale Exotics
company.tagline: Only Pay Us When You Get Paid
company.mission: Help exotic car rental fleet owners build automated systems that generate consistent $50k+ months

target_market.primary: Exotic and luxury car rental fleet owners

current_situation: Losing leads due to slow response times
Relying heavily on Turo or other platforms (losing 25-40% to fees)
Managing inquiries manually via Instagram DMs, texts, or calls
goals: Fill weekday gaps in their calendar
Build their own brand vs relying on platforms

disqualifiers: Fleet owners not serious about growth
Those unwilling to invest in systems
Those not operating in the exotic/luxury segment

pricing_model.description: We only get paid when the client gets paid
pricing_model.how_it_works: Client pays a fee only after a lead we send secures a deposit
pricing_model.key_selling_point: Unlike agencies that charge monthly retainers regardless of results, we have skin in the game

lead_magnet.name: Lead Magnet
lead_magnet.description: Build nonstop inbound demand through targeted acquisition loops, automated funnels, and content that attracts people already ready to book
lead_magnet.benefit: Consistent flow of qualified renters actively looking to book exotic cars

conversion_system.name: Conversion System
conversion_system.description: Convert every inquiry into revenue with instant responses, AI-driven qualification, and frictionless booking paths
conversion_system.benefit: Never lose a lead to slow response times again

insight_engine.name: Insight Engine
insight_engine.description: Complete visibility into business performance with live dashboards, forecasting, and actionable insights
insight_engine.benefit: Make data-driven decisions to maximize revenue

ai_system.name: AI Follow-Up Assistant
ai_system.description: 24/7 automated system that responds to leads instantly and converts them into booked rentals

instant_auto_reply.description: Responds to inquiries in under 30 seconds
instant_auto_reply.why_it_matters: After 5 minutes, chance of converting a lead drops by 80%

auto_deposit_links.description: Automatically sends payment/deposit links to qualified leads
auto_deposit_links.why_it_matters: Reduces friction and speeds up the booking process

custom_scripts.description: Fully customizable AI responses that match the client's voice and brand
custom_scripts.why_it_matters: Maintains brand consistency while automating communication

calendar_sync.description: Real-time availability syncing to prevent double bookings
calendar_sync.why_it_matters: Eliminates scheduling conflicts and manual calendar management

lead_pipeline.description: Track every conversation from inquiry to booking
lead_pipeline.why_it_matters: Complete visibility into where leads are in the funnel

key_selling_points: Works 24/7 - books while the client sleeps
Responds faster than any human could
100% customizable to match client's brand and voice

primary.headline: Pre-Qualified Renters Only
primary.description: We filter and qualify leads before sending them, so clients only deal with serious renters ready to book

primary.headline: Fill Your Weekday Gaps
primary.description: Most fleets are busy on weekends but empty Mon-Thu. Our system targets renters specifically for these slow periods

primary.headline: Your Cars Stay Booked, Not Parked
primary.description: Maximize fleet utilization with consistent bookings throughout the week

scale_exotics_advantages: 100% of revenue goes to client (minus our performance fee)
Build a real brand instead of platform dependence

agency_problems: Charge monthly retainers regardless of results
Generic strategies not built for exotic rentals
scale_exotics_advantages: Only pay when you get paid
Aligned incentives - we only win when client wins

steps.name: Discovery Call
steps.description: Learn about the fleet, goals, current challenges, and determine if we're a good fit

steps.name: Custom Strategy
steps.description: Build a tailored growth plan for their specific market and fleet

steps.name: System Setup
steps.description: Implement automated lead generation and booking systems

steps.name: Scale & Optimize
steps.description: Continuously improve systems to maximize revenue

qualification_survey.purpose: Pre-qualify leads before the sales call

questions.question: How many vehicles are in your fleet?
What % of weekdays are typically booked?
Where do most bookings come from?
What's holding back more bookings?
questions.why_we_ask: Identify primary pain point to address in sales call

ive_tried_marketing_before_it_didnt_work.response: Most marketing agencies charge regardless of results. We're different - you only pay when a lead actually puts down a deposit. Zero risk.
ive_tried_marketing_before_it_didnt_work.key_point: Align incentives - we only succeed when you succeed

i_dont_have_budget_for_this.response: There's no upfront cost. You only pay after you've already been paid. It's literally free to start.

i_can_handle_leads_myself.response: The problem isn't handling leads - it's response time. After 5 minutes, conversion drops 80%. Our AI responds in under 30 seconds, 24/7. Can you do that while running your business?
i_can_handle_leads_myself.key_point: Speed is everything in lead conversion

i_already_use_turo.response: Turo takes 25-40% of every booking. Same car, same renter - but you'd make 40% more profit going direct. We help you build that direct booking channel.

how_do_i_know_the_leads_are_qualified.response: Every lead goes through our qualification system before reaching you. We filter out tire-kickers and time-wasters. You only talk to people ready to book.
how_do_i_know_the_leads_are_qualified.key_point: Pre-qualification saves time and increases conversion

what_if_it_doesnt_work.response: If you don't get bookings, you don't pay. Simple as that. We take on all the risk.

i_need_to_think_about_it.response: Every day you wait, leads are going to competitors who respond faster. Our AI could be booking your cars tonight while you sleep. What specifically do you need to think about?
i_need_to_think_about_it.key_point: Create urgency around lost opportunity cost

key_statistics.response_time_impact: After 5 minutes, lead conversion drops by 80%

dashboard_features.overview: Complete command center for managing leads, bookings, and fleet

modules.name: Lead Pipeline
modules.description: Visual pipeline tracking leads from inquiry to booking

modules.name: AI Assistant
modules.description: Configure and monitor AI follow-up system

modules.name: Analytics
modules.description: Performance metrics, revenue tracking, and insights

modules.name: Settings
modules.description: Custom branding, AI scripts, calendar sync, and more

step_5_onboarding.process: Custom strategy > System setup > Launch > Optimize

talking_points.opening: Most exotic fleet owners are leaving 40% on the table with Turo, and losing even more leads because they can't respond fast enough. We solve both problems.
pain_agitation: How often do leads go cold because you couldn't respond in time?
What percentage of your revenue is Turo taking?
How many weekdays are your cars just sitting there?
talking_points.solution_bridge: What if you had an AI that responded to every lead in under 30 seconds, qualified them, and sent a deposit link - all while you sleep?
talking_points.close: We only get paid when you get paid. Ready to see how many bookings you're missing?
